info.title: RAG Chatbot API
info.description: API for the AI-Native Textbook RAG chatbot.

post.summary: Get an answer from the RAG chatbot

query.description: The user's question about the textbook content.

context.description: Optional: A specific snippet of text selected by the user to constrain the answer.

200.description: A successful response from the chatbot.

answer.description: The chatbot's answer to the user's query.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Could not process the request.
